data.text: @lilmarkuk @CBR I’m not sure you’re right.  But what’s more important is standing up for what’s right and what happened to Gunn isn’t right.  He was the target of right wing radicals looking to take him down for being critical of Trump.
@CBR Not really.  They basically issued non responses after people encouraged them to stick up for Gunn.
@CBR A Bible passage, a "wait and see" and a good luck to GOG cast. Nothing interesting here at all. And mostly certainly not news or worth your time
